vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προσκήνιον, τό,
entrance of a tent, [LXX]
__2 porch of a house, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II raised platform in front of stage-buildings, stage, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; Latin proscaenium, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__II.2 painted scenery at the back of the stage, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: painted scenery at the back of the stage
vocabInfos.mediumDef: painted scenery at the back of the stage
